articles.content: The accused has been identified as Hema Kaushik alias Dimpy. The Gurgaon police has arrested a woman for allegedly attempting to extort money from cricketer Yuvraj Singh's mother Shabnam Singh. The a… [+1206 chars]

articles.title: IPC Ministry clueless over NOC for hockey team's visit to Chennai - DAWN.com
articles.description: With just six days left be­f­ore the national squad is scheduled to lea­v­e for India, the PHF, it seems, has no clue about the NOC.
